question: If you connect an Active Buzzer and a Passive Buzzer to the same output pin, what is the MAIN difference in their sound output?
options: The Active Buzzer will be silent, and the Passive Buzzer will make a continuous tone.
The Active Buzzer will produce a continuous tone, and the Passive Buzzer will be silent.
Both will produce a continuous, identical tone.
Neither will make a sound without extra code.
answer: The Active Buzzer will produce a continuous tone, and the Passive Buzzer will be silent.
